AI.title: Leading AI integrations
AI.desc: Integration with OpenAI, Hugging Face, Langchain, and more allows ILLA to offer enhanced AI capabilities. By leveraging these powerful AI services, you can build a wide range of functionalities to enhance your business or accelerate the development.

teamwork.title: Smooth and efficient teamwork
teamwork.desc: We allow multiple users to collaborate on applications in real-time. With synchronized editing capabilities, team members can simultaneously work on different aspects of the project, ensuring a fluid and productive workflow.

anyone-can-use.title: Anyone can build tools
anyone-can-use.desc: From designing front-end interfaces with drag-and-drop components to integrating with data sources and generating queries using AI assistance, ILLA provides a streamlined experience that removes unnecessary complexities. You don't need to be a tech expert to create your own applications.

deploy.title: Deploy with One-click
deploy.desc: With ILLA Cloud, you don't have to worry about the deployment and release process. Once you have finished editing your application in ILLA, simply click the deploy button, and ILLA will take care of the rest.

unlimited-viewer.title: Free for unlimited viewers
unlimited-viewer.desc: You can freely add an unlimited number of viewers at no extra cost. This means you only need to pay for the fees associated with your editor members. It allows you to accommodate a growing number of users without incurring additional expenses.

rapid.title: Rapid idea implementation
rapid.desc: When enterprises experience a high demand for internal tools during rapid growth, ILLA Cloud can significantly accelerate the development speed and quality of your internal applications. This helps expedite your company's growth by quickly addressing the tooling needs.

no-skill.title: No skill limitations for editors
no-skill.desc: With ILLA Cloud, any individual within the organization can build the tools they need without requiring specialized teams or technical skills. This empowers employees across various roles to create their own solutions, fostering innovation and productivity.

cost-reduce.title: Cost reduction
cost-reduce.desc: By leveraging ILLA Cloud, enterprises can allocate their time, workforce, and financial resources towards core business activities. This results in reduced costs as ILLA streamlines the development process, eliminates the need for specialized teams, and minimizes the investment required for tooling development.

content.question: What is ILLA Cloud?
content.answer: ILLA Cloud is a low-code platform that inherits multiple capabilities from ILLA Builder and ILLA Drive. It provides a seamless experience by allowing users to log in and register to access its features. With ILLA Cloud, you can effortlessly build internal tools, dashboards, CRUD (create, read, update, delete) applications, and more. The platform significantly improves work efficiency and helps companies save costs.

content.question: Who can use ILLA Cloud
content.answer: Whether you are a product manager, full-stack developer, project manager, data analyst...anyone can use ILLA Cloud to build tools: From designing front-end interfaces with drag-and-drop components to integrating with data sources and generating queries using AI assistance, ILLA provides a streamlined experience that removes unnecessary complexities. You don't need to be a tech expert to create your own applications.

content.question: What kinds of applications can you develop using ILLA Cloud?
content.answer: With ILLA Cloud, you can build any application you need, such as commonly used internal tools like Dashboards, Admin Panels, CRUD apps, CRM, CMS, and more. Additionally, you can develop AI applications, such as text-to-image applications with Stable Diffusion, audio-to-text applications with Whisper, and even embed OpenAI's GPT models to assist you in completing various tasks.

content.question: Which data sources does ILLA support?
content.answer: ILLA supports integration with a variety of data sources, including PostgreSQL, MongoDB, REST API, GraphQL, Google Sheets, and more. You can swiftly connect to any data source without writing code, enabling seamless access to your desired data.
